metadata.title: CVE-2008-2544 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Mounting /proc filesystem via chroot command silently mounts it inread-write mode. The user could bypass the chroot environment and gainwrite access to files, he would never have otherwise.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
